welcome_message_body: Welcome to Simanggang, Malaysia! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's rich history, beautiful nature, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Simanggang has to offer.

restaurants.name: 99 Seafood
restaurants.description: 99 Seafood is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.description: Open Air Market, Sri Aman is a asian restaurant located in the city.
